728884f-a.text:
Grant Street, at the S. E. corner of St. Paul's Avenue,
showing Public School No. 15.
September 9, 1937
P. L. Sperr
728884f-a.folder: Grant Street & St. Paul's Avenue, Staten Island, NY
728884f-a.original_title: Richmond: Grant Street - St. Paul's Avenue

729601f-a.text:
St. Pauls Avenue, west side, twenty-five feet north of Grant Street. Beers's 1874 map shows the house to have belonged
to one named France.
November, 1919
P. L. Sperr
729601f-a.folder: St. Pauls Avenue & Grant Street, Staten Island, NY
729601f-a.original_title: Richmond: St. Pauls Avenue - Grant Street
